alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:25PM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to three inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds will average 15 to 25 MPH with highest gusts of 30 to 35 MPH, initially out of the northeast but then turning northwesterly Wednesday night. * WHERE...In Kansas, Jewell, Rooks, Osborne and Mitchell Counties. In Nebraska, Thayer County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight CST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will develop in time to impact the Wednesday morning commute and continue through the Wednesday evening commute. Lingering impacts into at least Thursday morning are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Please expect at least minor adjustments to later snowfall forecasts, as confidence levels in snow amounts at any given location is currently considered only medium.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
